test_cases.objective: Verify that the ERP system is correctly configured for pharmaceutical batch management with lot genealogy tracking as per URS-ERP-002.
prerequisites: SAP S/4HANA system is installed and operational

test_steps.action: Navigate to the batch management module in SAP S/4HANA.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch management module is accessible and displays configured pharmaceutical attributes.

test_steps.action: Create a test batch record with pharmaceutical-specific attributes.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is successfully created with all required attributes populated.

test_steps.action: Simulate a lot genealogy tracking scenario by linking multiple batches.
test_steps.expected_result: Lot genealogy is correctly tracked and displayed for the linked batches.

acceptance_criteria: Batch management module is fully functional
All pharmaceutical-specific attributes are correctly configured
Lot genealogy tracking works as specified
data_integrity_requirements: Batch records must be complete and accurate
Genealogy tracking must be unbroken

test_cases.objective: Validate that the Track & Trace functionality for serialization management is properly configured as per URS-ERP-003.
prerequisites: Integration with third-party serialization provider is configured

test_steps.action: Access the serialization management module in the ERP system.
test_steps.expected_result: Serialization module is accessible and displays configured Track & Trace functionality.

test_steps.action: Generate a test serial number for a pharmaceutical product.
test_steps.expected_result: Serial number is successfully generated and stored in the system.

test_steps.action: Simulate a product movement and verify serial number tracking.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly tracks and traces the serialized product through the movement.

acceptance_criteria: Serialization module is fully functional
Serial numbers are correctly generated and stored
Track & Trace functionality works as specified
data_integrity_requirements: Serial numbers must be unique and properly stored
Track & Trace data must be complete and accurate

test_cases.objective: Verify that batch management is correctly configured for pharmaceutical manufacturing with lot genealogy tracking.
prerequisites: SAP S/4HANA system is installed and operational

test_steps.action: Log in to the SAP S/4HANA system with appropriate credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and the main dashboard is displayed.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the batch management module and create a new batch record.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record creation screen is displayed with all required fields.

test_steps.action: Enter test batch data including lot genealogy information and save the record.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is saved successfully with lot genealogy information.

test_steps.action: Retrieve the saved batch record and verify the lot genealogy tracking.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is retrieved and lot genealogy information is correctly displayed.

acceptance_criteria: Batch record is created and saved successfully.
Lot genealogy information is correctly tracked and displayed.
data_integrity_requirements: Batch records must be complete and accurate.
Lot genealogy must be traceable.

test_cases.test_name: Batch Management and Lot Genealogy Tracking Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the ERP system correctly tracks batch genealogy and manages pharmaceutical batches according to GMP requirements.
prerequisites: ERP system is configured with batch management module
Test batches are created in the system

test_steps.action: Create a new batch record in the system with all required pharmaceutical attributes.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is successfully created with all attributes stored correctly.

test_steps.action: Link the test batch to a parent batch and verify the genealogy relationship.
test_steps.expected_result: Genealogy relationship is correctly established and visible in the system.

test_steps.action: Simulate a batch split operation and verify the system maintains proper genealogy.
test_steps.expected_result: Child batches correctly reference the original batch with complete traceability.

acceptance_criteria: All batch records maintain complete genealogy information
System enforces mandatory pharmaceutical attributes for batches
Genealogy relationships are immutable once established
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 211 - Current Good Manufacturing Practice for Finished Pharmaceuticals
data_integrity_requirements: ALCOA+ principles must be maintained for all batch records
Audit trail must capture all changes to batch attributes

test_cases.objective: Verify that the configured ERP system generates accurate regulatory compliance reports for pharmaceutical operations.
prerequisites: ERP system is configured with regulatory reporting modules
Test data exists for all report types

test_steps.action: Generate an FDA 483 observations response report using test data.
test_steps.expected_result: Report contains all required fields in FDA-compliant format.

test_steps.action: Generate an EMA GMP compliance report for a selected product.
test_steps.expected_result: Report includes all required EU GMP elements with accurate data.

test_steps.action: Verify the system's ability to filter reports by date range and regulatory body.
test_steps.expected_result: Reports are correctly filtered and maintain data integrity.

acceptance_criteria: All configured regulatory reports generate without errors
Report data matches source system records exactly
Reports include required regulatory elements and disclaimers
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 - Electronic Records; Electronic Signatures
data_integrity_requirements: Reports must be generated from validated data sources
Report generation must be logged in audit trail
